item.title: Zip Picture With Python
item.description: 1from PIL import Image 2import sys 3def gipit(pname): 4 with Image.open(pname) as im: 5 im.save(pname+'.jpeg', 'jpeg', progressive=True, optimize=True) 6if __name__ == '__main__': 7 _, pname = sys.argv 8 gipit(pname)

item.title: Flask Logger
item.description: Flask logging 使用 Flask 时，如何优雅的输出日志。这些日志也许需要特定的格式，更丰富的信息，或者添加一些上下文的信息（如当前登录的用户名）等等。 根据官方文档

item.title: Python Exec Object
item.description: exec() Syntax: 1exec(object[, globals[, locals]]) 2 3:param object: As already said this can be a string or object code 4:param globals: This can be a dictionary and the parameter is optional 5:param locals: This can be a mapping object and is also optional eg. 1from math import * 2exec("print(factorial(5))", {"factorial":factorial}) eval() Syntax: 1eval(expression[, globals[, locals]]) diff with exec() 1.eval accepts only a single expression, exec can take a code block that has Python statements: loops, try: except:, class and function/method definitions and so on.

item.title: Python Encode
item.description: Python Encoding b'' 型 1b'hello'.decode() u'' 型 1a=u'\xe5\x9c\xa3\xe5\xbd\xbc\xe5\xbe\x97\xe5\xa0\xa1\xe6\x8e\x92\xe5\x90\x8d\xe7\xac\xac1 \xe9\xa4\x90\xe5\x8e\x85(\xe5\x85\xb18,650 \xe9\x97\xb4)' 2print(a.encode('raw-unicode-escape')) \u00 型 1>>> a = u'\u00e6\u0097\u00a5\u00e6\u009c\u00ac\u00e5\u009f\u00bc\u00e7\u008e\u0089\u00e5\u00b8\u0082\n' 2>>> print(a) 3>>> print(a.encode('iso-8859-1').decode('utf-8')) \uxxxx 型 1a='\u56e0' 2print(a.decode('unicode-escape')) 1a = '\u00e6\u0097\u00a5\u00e6\u009c\u00ac\u00e5\u009f\u00bc\u00e7\u008e\u0089\u00e5\u00b8\u0082' 2print(a.decode('unicode-escape').encode('iso-8859-1').decode('utf8')) unicode+ascii，且u前没有\ 1#coding=utf8 2s = ' 15  Erfurtu00e4u00b8u008du00e5u0088u00b0 5 u00e5u0085u00acu00e9u0087u008cu00e3u0080u0082 ' 3 4import re 5 6pattern = re.compile(r'((u00([a-z0-9]){2})+)') 7for i in pattern.findall(s):

item.title: Python GC
item.description: Python GC ##Python 垃圾回收原理 对象 Python所谓的“一切皆对象”，实际上说的是： python有一个Common Object Structures通用对象结构的东西

item.title: Python Challenges
item.description: pythonchallenge 游戏入口 http://www.pythonchallenge.com/ 挺好玩的解密小游戏，会上瘾 第零关 Hint: try to change the URL address. 12**38 = 274877906944 1http://www.pythonchallenge.com/pc/def/274877906944.html 第一关 everybody thinks twice before solving this. g fmnc wms bgblr rpylqjyrc gr zw fylb. rfyrq ufyr amknsrcpq ypc dmp. bmgle gr gl zw fylb gq glcddgagclr ylb rfyr’q ufw rfgq rcvr gq qm jmle.
